title: Archipelago Books (11 Translated Books)
description:
Archipelago Books is an American "not-for-profit publisher dedicated to promoting cross-cultural exchange through international literature in translation." Located in Brooklyn, New York, it publishes small to mid-size runs of international fiction, poetry, and literary essays. The press was founded in 2003 by Jill Schoolman. On marking its 10th anniversary, Archipelago had published one hundred books, translated from more than twenty-six languages into English.

===================================================================================

The torrent contains all the following books in epub format:

* Albert Cohen - Book of My Mother, Translated from the French by Bella Cohen

* Antonio Tabucchi - The Flying Creatures of Fra Angelico, Translated from the Italian by Tim Parks

* Attila Bartis - Tranquility, Translated from the Hungarian by Imre Goldstein

* Enrico Pea - Moscardino, Translated from the Italian by Ezra Pound

* Eric Chevillard - Palafox, Translated from the French by Wyatt Mason

* Eric Chevillard - Prehistoric Times, Translated from the French by Alyson Waters

* Ernst Weiss - Georg Letham, Translated from the German by Joel Rotenberg

* Heinrich von Kleist - Selected Prose of Heinrich Von Kleis, Translated from the German by Peter Wortsman

* Marguerite Duras - Yann Andrea Steiner, Translated from the French by Mark Polizzotti

* Ryunosuke Akutagawa - Mandarins, Translated from the Japanese by Charles De Wolf

* Yuri Rytkheu - The Chukchi Bible, Translated from the Russian by Ilona Yazhbin
